channel.title: Workspace Members on
channel.description: Recent content in Workspace Members on

item.title: Invite Users to Join Workspaces
item.description:
This section explains how to invite users to join a workspace.

Prerequisites

You should join a workspace and have the Member Management permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Member Management permission, and access your workspace.

  2. Click Workspace Settings > Workspace Members in the left navigation pane.

  3. Click Invite on the right side of the page.

  4. In the Invite Member dialog, click next to the user you want to invite. Select the role of the user in the workspace from the dropdown list, then click OK.

    KubeSphere provides the following preset workspace roles:

item.title: View Workspace Member List
item.description:
This section explains how to view the workspace member list.

Prerequisites

You should join a workspace and have the Member Viewing permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Member Viewing permission, and access your workspace.

  2. Click Workspace Settings > Workspace Members in the left navigation pane.

    • The workspace member list provides the following information:

      Parameter Description

      Name

item.title: View Workspace Member Details
item.description:
This section explains how to view workspace member details.

Prerequisites

You should join a workspace and have the Member Viewing permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Member Viewing permission, and access your workspace.

  2. Click Workspace Settings > Workspace Members in the left navigation pane.

  3. Click the name of a workspace member in the list to open its details page.

  4. In the Attributes section on the left side of the workspace member details page, view the resource attributes of the workspace member.

    Parameter Description

    Workspace

item.title: Change Workspace Member Roles
item.description:
This section explains how to change the role of a workspace member.

Prerequisites

You should join a workspace and have the Member Management permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Member Management permission, and access your workspace.

  2. Click Workspace Settings > Workspace Members in the left navigation pane.

  3. On the right side of the workspace member you want to edit, click , then select Change Role.

  4. In the Change Role dialog, set the role for the workspace member from the dropdown list, then click OK.

    KubeSphere provides the following preset workspace roles:

item.title: Remove Workspace Members
item.description:
This section explains how to remove a workspace member.

Note

Once a user is removed from the workspace, they will lose the permissions provided by the workspace role. If the user has joined projects in the workspace, they will also be removed from those projects.

Prerequisites

You should join a workspace and have the Member Management permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".
